title: Platform Zero E-Sports (PZE) Bar Tournaments

embed.description: PZE Bar - Platform Zero Esports, Bankstown, New South Wales. 1K likes. PZE Bar is home to Platform Zero Esports at Bankstown Sports. There's weekly tournaments to enjoy on PC and XBOX. Keep up to...

body:
Hey Summoners,
We are a gaming bar located in Sydney and we have just started running weekly League of Legends tournaments every friday
Details are all on our facebook and the link down below will be the stream that will happen every friday this runs 
Free to enter and prizes up for grabs, but most importantly we aim to bring together the community.

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} 



https://www.twitch.tv/officialmangoman
